"Xiera": "<red>Resta<c> is a Light-attribute Technique that <red>restores your HP and the HP of nearby allies<c>."
"Try healing yourself and Afin with Resta."

"Resta is a Light-attribute Technique that recovers the HP of all allies within range.

The effect remains in place for a short time after the initial cast, and you can benefit from it by entering its area of effect as long as it is active.

In battle, casting Resta before you take damage can be useful."
